blocks.title: Craig's Test Site
blocks.text: This is my test site. Although I leave much of the links up, I'm adding, removing and breaking stuff all the time. Your mileage may vary.
blocks.note: Note: This is the autogenerated version of the site. It's likely out of date and is missing some stuff.

list.name: PqPlot
list.text: This is an interactive viewer for viewing price vs quantity plots for road construction bidding data. This features stacked transparent canvas elements, zooming, panning, filtering and information overlays. This app doesn't use any external libraries other than jquery.

list.name: Invoice Preview
list.text: This is a program used to preview gas customer invoices. Only preview buttons work because data is anonymized.

list.name: Survey Builder
list.text: Prototype for building surveys for Trivox Health.

list.name: Module Builder
list.text: Prototype for building modules for Trivox Health.

list.name: AutoPage
list.text: Generate's this site using a json file.

list.name: MenuGen
list.text: This is a program for producing Sweetwater Branch Inn event menu's in pdf format. It's completely metadata driven.

list.name: Slideshow
list.text: This is a perl progam for displaying slideshows. It is metadata controlled and is easy to modify.

list.name: TrivoxText
list.text: This is a program used to edit the text used by Trivox. The main focus is   to enter Spanish and Portugeuse versions of the text.

list.name: Perl and Node
list.text: This is a simple app that posts messages using 2 alternative backends.

list.name: Gnu - perl library
list.text: Perl library including GScript an imbedded language with an interpreter

list.name: Gnulib - c++ library
list.text: C utility library

list.name: Gnu - c++ library
list.text: C++ library. Mostly for MFC GUI stuff

list.name: GCLib - imbedded language
list.text: GCLib an imbedded language in C++ with a compiler and a VM

list.name: Input recall history
list.text: This is a jQuery plugin to allow recall of previous values in input fields with editing (cmd-shell like)

list.name: Trivox DatePicker
list.text: Trivox Specific fuzzy date input handling

list.name: Life
list.text: Conway's game of life simulator (cellular automata). Canvas, no frameworks or libraries.

list.name: 3D Life
list.text: 3D version of life. Uses ES6 Native Arrays, which made this much faster. Canvas, no frameworks or libraries.

list.name: Rotating Life
list.text: A demo using three.js and the above Life canvas toy.

list.name: xyit
list.text: Animations using math expressions. Based on tixy.land.  Canvas, no frameworks or libraries.

list.name: Ball Bearings
list.text: A demo using three.js

list.name: L-System
list.text: An Lindenmayer system using SVG. No libraries or frameworks.

list.name: Mandelbrot generator
list.text: A mandelbrot generator. Canvas, no frameworks or libraries.

list.name: SVG Particle Animator
list.text: Sample animations using svg.  SVG, no frameworks or libraries.

list.name: Cardioid Animator
list.text: Generates cardioids.  Canvas, no frameworks or libraries.

list.name: Skull
list.text: Floating skull. My first demo using three.js

list.name: Bubbles Animation
list.text: Sample javascript animation using basic npm & webpack with no framework, canvas & jquery with no graphic libs
